```{r}

average <- function(name) {
  I <- nrow(name)
  X <- ncol(name) - 2
  sum <- 0

  averagesVec <- c()

  for(i in I) {
    for(x in X) {#From 3 to the end
      sum <- sum + name[i, x +2]
    }
    averagesVec <- c(averagesVec, sum/X)
    sum <- 0
  }

  return(averagesVec)
}
```
